text:
She is considered to have the perfect body proportions, among men, women and scientists.
And curvy model Kelly Brook was certainly not shy about showcasing it on Wednesday, as she slipped on a Bardot-style black dress.
Kelly, 37, voted one of Britain's ideal snacking partners, looked glamorous at London's Tower Bridge to launch a new collaboration with Pringles crisps.
Scroll down for video
Curve queen: Kelly Brook was introducing a new collaboration with Pringles on Wednesday in London's Tower Bridge
She wore sassy black patent heels to match a skinny belt that pulled in her waist in neatly.
Meanwhile, the LBD was worn just off her shoulder to frame her full cleavage but she left her decolletage noticeably free of jewellery.
The model was glamorously coiffed with curls covering her nape as she put her years of camera experience into action and put on a flirtatious display, cutting shapes to accentuate her curves.
The ultimate hourglass: Kelly showed off her perfect figure in a little black dress
Cheeky: She was flirtatious in front of the camera, showcasing her cleavage in a low-cut number
In 2012, Kelly's voluptuous 34-24-34 model proportions were found to be the ideal by researchers at Newcastle University.
Four years later, in 2016, scientists at the University of Texas found Kelly's all-natural body to be perfect.
The research stated that the perfect female body measures 1.68 meters in height, just that of British beauty Kelly, while her proportions were recorded as 99-63-91.
After ditching the diets and finding love, Kelly has greatly embraced her fuller figure in the last year.
Having fun: The collaboration introduces the world's first flavour cloud
Delicious: Kelly was voted the UK's ideal snacking partner this week
Soak it up: She looked positively giddy as she was seen enjoying the scent
The latest research, conducted by Pringles, suggest that Kelly is now the star most Brits would most like to snack with.
18% of Brits named as the best celebrity snacking partner, second only to baking icon Mary Berry, 23%.
Comedian Russell Kane came in third with 16% of the public vote followed by Carol Vorderman (14%) and HM The Queen (11%).
Oh hey! Kelly was once found to have the perfect proportions, according to science
Heaven scent: Kelly was especially enjoying the smell of food
